entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022
